query.sfwSql: select ct.*,org.org_code from sgt_contact_ticket ct left outer join sgt_organization org on ct.org_id = org.org_id order by created_date desc
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SGT_PERSON WHERE PERSON_ID=@PERSON_ID
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SGT_ORGANIZATION WHERE ORG_CODE=@ORG_CODE

SELECT 'CONTACT TICKETS' AS GROUPNAME,CV.DESCRIPTION,CT.CREATED_DATE AS DATE,COUNT(1) AS RECORDCOUNT FROM SGT_CONTACT_TICKET CT LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV ON CT.CONTACT_TYPE_VALUE=CV.CODE_VALUE AND CT.CONTACT_TYPE_ID=CV.CODE_ID WHERE CT.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @START_DATE AND @END_DATE GROUP BY CT.CONTACT_TYPE_VALUE,CT.CREATED_DATE,CV.DESCRIPTION
UNION ALL
SELECT 'APPOINTMENT SCHEDULE' AS GROUPNAME,CV.DESCRIPTION,APS.CREATED_DATE AS DATE,COUNT(1) FROM SGT_APPOINTMENT_SCHEDULE APS LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV ON APS.APPOINTMENT_TYPE_VALUE=CV.CODE_VALUE AND APS.APPOINTMENT_TYPE_ID=CV.CODE_ID WHERE APS.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @START_DATE AND @END_DATE AND APPOINTMENT_CANCEL_FLAG <> 'Y' GROUP BY APS.APPOINTMENT_TYPE_VALUE,APS.CREATED_DATE,CV.DESCRIPTION
UNION ALL
SELECT 'SEMINAR SCHEDULE' AS GROUPNAME,CV.DESCRIPTION,SS.CREATED_DATE AS DATE,COUNT(1) FROM SGT_SEMINAR_SCHEDULE SS LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV ON SS.SEMINAR_TYPE_VALUE=CV.CODE_VALUE AND SS.SEMINAR_TYPE_ID=CV.CODE_ID WHERE SS.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @START_DATE AND @END_DATE AND SEMINAR_CANCEL_FLAG <> 'Y' GROUP BY SS.SEMINAR_TYPE_VALUE,SS.CREATED_DATE,CV.DESCRIPTION
UNION ALL
SELECT 'CORRESPONDENCE' AS GROUPNAME,CV.DESCRIPTION,CORR.CREATED_DATE AS DATE,COUNT(1) FROM SGS_COR_TEMPLATES CORR LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV ON CORR.TEMPLATE_GROUP_VALUE=CV.CODE_VALUE AND CORR.TEMPLATE_GROUP_ID=CV.CODE_ID WHERE CORR.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @START_DATE AND @END_DATE GROUP BY CORR.TEMPLATE_GROUP_VALUE,CORR.CREATED_DATE,CV.DESCRIPTION

SELECT DISTINCT u.user_serial_id,first_name +' '+ last_name full_name from sgs_user u inner join sgs_user_roles ur on u.USER_SERIAL_ID = ur.USER_SERIAL_ID and ((ur.effective_start_DATE is null) or (ur.effective_start_date<=convert(dateTime,convert(char,getdate(),103),103))) and ((ur.effective_end_DATE is null) or (ur.effective_end_date>=convert(dateTime,convert(char,getdate(),103),103))) inner join sgs_security s on s.role_id = ur.role_id and s.security_value != 0 inner join sgs_resources r on r.resource_id = s.resource_id where s.resource_id = 53 order by full_name

SELECT DISTINCT u.user_serial_id,first_name +' '+last_name full_name from sgs_user u inner join sgs_user_roles ur on u.USER_SERIAL_ID = ur.USER_SERIAL_ID and ((ur.effective_start_DATE is null) or (ur.effective_start_date<=convert(dateTime,convert(char,getdate(),103),103))) and ((ur.effective_end_DATE is null) or (ur.effective_end_date>=convert(dateTime,convert(char,getdate(),103),103))) inner join sgs_security s on s.role_id = ur.role_id and s.security_value != 0 inner join sgs_resources r on r.resource_id = s.resource_id where s.resource_id = 52 order by full_name
select b.user_id from sgt_contact_ticket a inner join sgs_user b on a.assign_to_user_id = b.user_serial_id where contact_ticket_id = @contactTicketID

select c.user_id from sgt_contact_ticket a inner join sgt_appointment_schedule b on a.contact_ticket_id = b.contact_ticket_id inner join sgs_user c on b.counselor_user_id = c.user_serial_id where a.contact_ticket_id = @contactTicketID

select * from sgt_contact_ticket a left outer join sgt_appointment_schedule b on a.contact_ticket_id = b.contact_ticket_id where a.person_id = @personID AND( a.status_value <> 'CLOS' OR (a.status_value = 'CLOS' AND datediff(dd,a.modified_date,getDate()) <= 90) ) and a.IS_TICKET_CREATED_FROM_PORTAL_FLAG = 'Y'

select * from sgt_contact_ticket a left outer join sgt_appointment_schedule b on a.contact_ticket_id = b.contact_ticket_id where a.org_id = @orgID AND( a.status_value <> 'CLOS' OR (a.status_value = 'CLOS' AND datediff(dd,a.modified_date,getDate()) <= 90) ) and a.IS_TICKET_CREATED_FROM_PORTAL_FLAG = 'Y'

select a.*,b.* from sgt_seminar_attendee_detail a inner join sgt_seminar_schedule b on a.seminar_schedule_id = b.seminar_schedule_id inner join sgt_contact_ticket c on b.contact_ticket_id = c.contact_ticket_id where b.attendee_fee > 0 and (a.attendee_fee_paid_flag is null or a.attendee_fee_paid_flag = 'N')
select * from SGT_SEMINAR_ATTENDEE_DETAIL where payment_method_value = 'PRCK' AND (ATTENDEE_FEE_PAID_FLAG IS NULL OR ATTENDEE_FEE_PAID_FLAG = 'N')

SELECT b.CONTACT_TICKET_ID, a.*, b.* FROM sgt_seminar_attendee_detail a INNER JOIN sgt_seminar_schedule b ON a.seminar_schedule_id = b.seminar_schedule_id INNER JOIN sgt_person c ON a.person_id = c.person_id WHERE a.payment_method_value = 'IDBL' AND b.CONTACT_TICKET_ID = case when isnull(@ContactTicketID ,0) = 0 then b.CONTACT_TICKET_ID else @ContactTicketID end ORDER BY CASE @SortBy WHEN 0 THEN c.LAST_NAME ELSE NULL END, CASE @SortBy WHEN 1 THEN c.PERSON_ID ELSE NULL END

select a.person_id,a.org_id,a.contact_ticket_id,b.activity_instance_id from sgt_contact_ticket a WITH(NOLOCK) inner join sgw_bpm_activity_instance b WITH(NOLOCK) on b.reference_id = a.contact_ticket_id inner join sgw_bpm_process_instance d WITH(NOLOCK) on d.process_instance_id = b.process_instance_id inner join sgw_bpm_process e WITH(NOLOCK) on d.process_id=e.process_id inner join SGW_BPM_PROCESS_ID_DESC f WITH(NOLOCK) on f.process_id=213 and f.DESCRIPTION=e.DESCRIPTION inner join sgt_seminar_schedule c WITH(NOLOCK) on c.contact_ticket_id = a.contact_ticket_id where a.CONTACT_TYPE_VALUE = 'SEM' and a.status_value not in ('CANC','CLOS') and SEMINAR_CANCEL_FLAG <> 'Y' and datediff(day,getdate(),SEMINAR_DATE1) <= 30 and SEMINAR_DATE1 > getdate() and b.status_value = 'SUSP' union select a.person_id,a.org_id,a.contact_ticket_id,0 from sgt_contact_ticket a WITH(NOLOCK) inner join sgt_seminar_schedule c WITH(NOLOCK) on c.contact_ticket_id = a.contact_ticket_id where a.CONTACT_TYPE_VALUE = 'SEM' and a.status_value not in ('CANC','CLOS') and SEMINAR_CANCEL_FLAG <> 'Y' and datediff(day,getdate(),SEMINAR_DATE1) <= 30 and SEMINAR_DATE1 > getdate() and NOT EXISTS(select 1 from sgw_bpm_activity_instance at WITH(NOLOCK) inner join sgw_bpm_process_instance b WITH(NOLOCK) on at.process_instance_id = b.process_instance_id inner join sgw_bpm_process e WITH(NOLOCK) on b.process_id=e.process_id inner join SGW_BPM_PROCESS_ID_DESC f WITH(NOLOCK) on f.PROCESS_ID=213 and f.DESCRIPTION=e.DESCRIPTION inner join sgw_bpm_case_instance ci WITH(NOLOCK) on b.case_instance_id=ci.case_instance_id where ci.reference_id = a.contact_ticket_id)
SELECT * FROM SGS_CODE_VALUE WHERE CODE_ID=1007 AND ISNULL(DATA1,'') <> 'N'

SELECT * FROM SGT_CONTACT_TICKET WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ORG_ID = @ORGID AND CONTACT_TYPE_VALUE IN ('RTPR', 'DFPR', 'INPR', 'OTPR') AND (STATUS_VALUE <> 'CLOS' OR (STATUS_VALUE = 'CLOS' AND datediff(DD, MODIFIED_DATE, GETDATE()) <= 90) ) and IS_TICKET_CREATED_FROM_PORTAL_FLAG = 'Y' ORDER BY CONTACT_TICKET_ID DESC

SELECT * FROM SGT_CONTACT_TICKET SCT INNER JOIN SGT_APPOINTMENT_SCHEDULE SAS ON SCT.CONTACT_TICKET_ID = SAS.CONTACT_TICKET_ID WHERE SCT.ORG_ID = @ORGID AND( SCT.STATUS_VALUE <> 'CLOS' OR (SCT.STATUS_VALUE = 'CLOS' AND DATEDIFF(DD, SCT.MODIFIED_DATE, GETDATE()) <= 90) ) AND SCT.IS_TICKET_CREATED_FROM_PORTAL_FLAG = 'Y' ORDER BY SCT.CONTACT_TICKET_ID DESC

SELECT * FROM SGT_CONTACT_TICKET SCT INNER JOIN SGT_DEATH_NOTICE SDN ON SCT.CONTACT_TICKET_ID = SDN.CONTACT_TICKET_ID WHERE SCT.ORG_ID = @ORGID AND( SCT.STATUS_VALUE <> 'CLOS' OR (SCT.STATUS_VALUE = 'CLOS' AND DATEDIFF(DD, SCT.MODIFIED_DATE, GETDATE()) <= 90) ) AND SCT.IS_TICKET_CREATED_FROM_PORTAL_FLAG = 'Y' ORDER BY SCT.CONTACT_TICKET_ID DESC

SELECT CONTACT_TICKET_HISTORY_ID, CONTACT_TICKET_ID, STATUS_VALUE, NOTES , MODIFIED_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE FROM SGT_CONTACT_TICKET_HISTORY WHERE CONTACT_TICKET_ID = @CONTACT_TICKET_ID AND PUBLISH_WSS = 'Y' ORDER BY CONTACT_TICKET_HISTORY_ID DESC
select assign_to_user_id from sgt_contact_ticket where contact_ticket_id = @contactTicketID

SELECT COUNSELOR_USER_ID FROM SGT_APPOINTMENT_SCHEDULE A WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_CONTACT_TICKET C WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.CONTACT_TICKET_ID = C.CONTACT_TICKET_ID WHERE C.CONTACT_TICKET_ID = @CONTACTTICKETID

SELECT PERSON_ID, ISNULL(FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(MIDDLE_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(LAST_NAME,'') + ', ' + CAST(PERSON_ID AS VARCHAR(20)) 'FULL_NAME' FROM SGT_PERSON WHERE PERSON_ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT PERSON_ID FROM SGT_PERSON WHERE PERSON_ID=@PERSON_ID UNION SELECT DISTINCT PERSON_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_CONTACT WHERE PERSON_ID=@PERSON_ID UNION SELECT DISTINCT CONTACT_PERSON_ID AS PERSON_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_CONTACT WHERE PERSON_ID=@PERSON_ID AND RELATIONSHIP_VALUE = 'SPOU' AND STATUS_VALUE ='ACT' UNION SELECT DISTINCT DEPENDENT_PERSLINK_ID AS PERSON_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_DEPENDENT SPD WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEPENDENT SPAD WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPAD.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID=SPD.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=SPAD.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON PLN.PLAN_ID=SPA.PLAN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON P WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPD.DEPENDENT_PERSLINK_ID = P.PERSON_ID WHERE SPD.PERSON_ID=@PERSON_ID AND SPD.RELATIONSHIP_VALUE <> 'SPOU' AND SPAD.END_DATE IS NULL UNION SELECT DISTINCT BENEFICIARY_PERSON_ID AS PERSON_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_BENEFICIARY SPD WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_BENEFICIARY SPAD WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPAD.BENEFICIARY_ID=SPD.BENEFICIARY_PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=SPAD.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON PLN.PLAN_ID=SPA.PLAN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON P WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPD.BENEFICIARY_PERSON_ID = P.PERSON_ID WHERE SPD.PERSON_ID=@PERSON_ID AND SPD.RELATIONSHIP_VALUE <> 'SPOU' AND SPAD.END_DATE IS NULL)
